wikipedia_page.main: Daniel Chapman Stillson (March 25, 1826 – August 23, 1899) was an American inventor. He invented the modern adjustable pipe wrench.

response: * Daniel Chapman Stillson, inventor of the modern adjustable pipe wrench

response: *Daniel Chapman Stillson (1826-1899), American inventor of the Pipe wrench
